title: The Ritz-Carlton
description: The Ritz-Carlton is a distinguished brand in the luxury hospitality industry, known for its elegant and timeless design. The brand's signature color palette features a deep and sophisticated blue (#006B95), complemented by shades of grey (#4F5B65), regal gold (#B3812A), and a bold red (#A01A1F). These colors are part of their branding standards, as outlined in their official brand guidelines document.
